name: OpenL
description: OpenL is an AI-powered translation platform supporting over 100 languages for seamless global communication.
longDescription: OpenL is an advanced AI-driven translation platform designed to break language barriers by providing accurate translations across text, documents, images, and audio in over 100 languages, including niche ones like Ancient Greek and Emoji. Leveraging machine learning and neural translation technology, it ensures native-level precision, making it ideal for professional, academic, and personal use. The platform offers tools for grammar correction, writing refinement, and language learning to enhance user skills. With a user-friendly interface, OpenL provides 30 free daily translations and premium plans for extended needs. It prioritizes user privacy by deleting translation data post-process and supports secure payments through trusted providers. OpenL aims to streamline multilingual tasks and foster global connectivity.
features: Translates text, documents, images, and audio in over 100 languages with high accuracy.
Preserves original formatting in document translations for PDF, Word, Excel, and more.
Offers Fast Mode for quick translations and Advanced Mode for precise professional outputs.
Provides AI-powered grammar correction to improve writing quality.
Includes language learning tools to enhance user proficiency in various languages.
Supports multiple file formats like PDF, DOCX, PNG, MP3, and SRT for versatile translation.
Ensures user privacy by not storing translation data after processing.
Offers 30 free daily translation credits for unregistered users.
Provides a 30% discount for students and educators with .edu email addresses.
Integrates secure payment options like Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, and PayPal.
Features a desktop app for distraction-free use on Mac and Windows.
Utilizes Cloudflare for rapid deployment, security, and performance optimization.

faqs.question: What languages does OpenL support?
faqs.answer: OpenL supports over 100 languages, including English, Arabic, Chinese, French, Spanish, and niche languages like Ancient Greek, Old Norse, and Emoji.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, OpenL offers 30 free trial credits daily for unregistered users, allowing translations of up to 1,500 characters per session.

faqs.question: How does OpenL ensure user privacy?
faqs.answer: OpenL deletes all translation data immediately after processing, storing history only in the userâ€™s local browser, not on its servers.

faqs.question: What file formats can OpenL translate?
faqs.answer: OpenL supports multiple formats, including PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, CSV, EPUB, SRT, PNG, and MP3.

faqs.question: Can I use OpenL on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, OpenL offers an iOS app for translations, but subscriptions are device-specific and not interchangeable with the web version.

faqs.question: Are there discounts for students or educators?
faqs.answer: Students and educators with .edu email addresses can email hi@openl.io to receive a 30% discount code, applicable once per year.

faqs.question: What is the difference between Fast Mode and Advanced Mode?
faqs.answer: Fast Mode provides quick translations for casual use, while Advanced Mode offers detailed, precise translations for professional and academic purposes.

faqs.question: How secure are payments on OpenL?
faqs.answer: Payments are handled securely by Lemon Squeezy using advanced encryption, with credit card details sent directly to the bank, not stored by OpenL.

faqs.question: Can I translate large documents with the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan limits translations to 1,500 characters; for larger documents up to 100,000 characters, upgrade to a paid plan.
